text: @kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump even if accurate...that's a 0.0002 mortality rate...(hmmm) that's nearly 10,000x less than the Coronavirus rates....still waiting for tests to reach the masses...Go Be Productive!!! don't just spin crap for a dopey @potus
